TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {4882=According to our research of North Carolina and other state lists there were 80 registered sex offenders living in Lincolnton, North Carolina as of July 30, 2015. The ratio of number of residents in Lincolnton to the number of sex offenders is 133 to 1.}
